content:
1. Descriptive Query: To understand the number of songs added to different playlists on Spotify, you could use the following SQL query:

SELECT COUNT(song\_id) as total\_songs, playlist\_name
FROM playlist\_data
WHERE platform = 'Spotify'
GROUP BY playlist\_name
ORDER BY total\_songs DESC;

This query would return the number of songs added to each playlist on Spotify, with the playlists ordered by the number of songs in descending order.

2. Exploratory Data Analysis Query: To understand the relationship between playlist size and the number of streams a song receives on Spotify, you could use the following SQL query:

SELECT AVG(streams) as avg\_streams, COUNT(song\_id) as playlist\_size
FROM playlist\_data
WHERE platform = 'Spotify'
GROUP BY playlist\_size
ORDER BY avg\_streams DESC;

This query would return the average number of streams for songs added to playlists of different sizes on Spotify, with the playlists ordered by average number of streams in descending order. This query would allow you to understand if there is any correlation between playlist size and song streams.
